Occupation History:
Egli Kaufmann Lehmann is a 66 year old retired Regulatory Affairs Director from Switzerland. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Egli Kaufmann Lehmann launched his career as a Research Scientist at Johnson & Johnson Switzerland, where he gained valuable experience from 1983 to 1987.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Clinical Trials Manager at Johnson & Johnson Switzerland in 1987, further expanding his skill set.
From 1991 till retirement, he served as a Regulatory Affairs Director at Novartis AG, solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
